Quick: +1 attack w/light weapons
Run: Retains Dexterity bonus to AC while running
Sneak Attack: Hit inflicts +3d6 HP when foe is surprised or flanked
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dexterity modifier to AC

Slippery Mind: May attempt second save vs. enchantment in next rd

Magic
Spells:
Blur (Shadow Walker2 Illu): Foes attacking touched have 20% miss chance for 15 min
Displacement (Shadow Walker3 Illu): Foes attacking touched suffer 50% miss chance for 15 rd

Disguise Contraband: Divination and detection on 10' cu of contraband fails 10 for hr
Mystifying Speech: Change 5 min of memory of 10 listeners (DC 23 Will neg) 2/dy
